metadata.title: CVE-2024-27913 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
ospf_te_parse_te in ospfd/ospf_te.c in FRRouting (FRR) through 9.1 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (ospfd daemon crash) via amalformed OSPF LSA packet, because of an attempted access to a missingattribute field.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-27913` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

frr - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu1.3
frr-pythontools - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu1.3
frr-rpki-rtrlib - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu1.3
frr-snmp - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: frr package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.4.4-1.1ubuntu1.3').
